Headline: #8A South Halsted Temporary Northbound Reroute near Halsted/95th
ShortDescription: Northbound #8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 95th, Vincennes, 86th pl, due to street blockage near Halsted/95th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 95th, Vincennes, 86th pl, then resume their normal route on Halsted, due to street blockage near Halsted/95th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Resuming Normal Routing
ShortDescription: Red Line service is resuming its normal routing, via the subway, btwn Fullerton & Cermak-Chinatown after an earlier reroute.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service is resuming its normal routing, via the subway, between Fullerton & Cermak-Chinatown.

Trains were temporarily rerouted via the elevated lines due to police activity.

Allow extra travel time.
